name: Reality Incognita
description: A sci-fi adventure, that keeps you in suspense, but yet hilarious
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8/ Windows 10 Processor: 1.8GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Mac not supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8/ Windows 10 Processor: 2.16GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 2048MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Mac not supported
